label: thm-potential-operator-is-mean-square-continuous
name: The Fitness Potential Operator is Mean-Square Continuous
natural_language_statement:
The **Fitness Potential Operator** is **mean-square continuous**. There exists a deterministic function $F_{\text{pot}}(\mathcal{S}_1, \mathcal{S}_2)$, the **Expected Squared Potential Error Bound**, such that:

$$
\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{V}_1 - \mathbf{V}_2\|_2^2] \le F_{\text{pot}}(\mathcal{S}_1, \mathcal{S}_2)
$$

raw_fallback.label: thm-potential-operator-is-mean-square-continuous
raw_fallback.name: The Fitness Potential Operator is Mean-Square Continuous
raw_fallback.statement:
The **Fitness Potential Operator** is **mean-square continuous**. There exists a deterministic function $F_{\text{pot}}(\mathcal{S}_1, \mathcal{S}_2)$, the **Expected Squared Potential Error Bound**, such that:

$$
\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{V}_1 - \mathbf{V}_2\|_2^2] \le F_{\text{pot}}(\mathcal{S}_1, \mathcal{S}_2)
$$
raw_fallback.conclusion: Fitness potential operator is mean-square continuous
raw_fallback.context: Section 16: The Cloning Transition Measure, subsection 15.2.6
